Operation 'connections' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, not_actionable. Summary 'connections' is a noun, not action-oriented. Description is clear but summary lacks verb and actionability. Improved summary uses action verb 'Retrieve' and clarifies what is being retrieved for better AI agent understanding.

data.current_description: Returns an array of all peer connection statuses.
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves a complete array of all active peer connection statuses. Returns status information for each connected peer in the network. No input parameters required.
data.reasoning: Summary 'connections' is a noun, not action-oriented. Description is clear but summary lacks verb and actionability. Improved summary uses action verb 'Retrieve' and clarifies what is being retrieved for better AI agent understanding.

message: Operation 'connect' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, missing_input_details, missing_output_details. Summary is too generic (single word). Description lacks details about required inputs (peer identifier/address), expected outputs (what confirmation includes), and whether the operation is synchronous or asynchronous. Enhanced version provides clarity for AI agents on when and how to use this operation.

data.current_description: Initiate a connection to a specified peer.
data.description_suggestion: Initiates a network connection to a specified peer. Requires the peer identifier or address as input. Returns confirmation of the connection attempt including connection status and peer information. Connection establishment may be asynchronous.
data.reasoning: Summary is too generic (single word). Description lacks details about required inputs (peer identifier/address), expected outputs (what confirmation includes), and whether the operation is synchronous or asynchronous. Enhanced version provides clarity for AI agents on when and how to use this operation.

message: Operation 'disconnect' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, missing_input_details, missing_output_details, missing_side_effects. Summary is a single word without action clarity. Description lacks input requirements, output details, and side effects. Enhanced version specifies what input is needed, what is returned, and importantly, what state changes occur (channel termination, status updates) for AI agent decision-making.

data.current_description: Initiate disconnection from a specified peer.
data.description_suggestion: Initiates disconnection from a specified peer in the network. Requires the peer identifier as input. Returns confirmation of the disconnection request. Side effects include terminating all active communication channels with the specified peer and updating peer connection status.
data.reasoning: Summary is a single word without action clarity. Description lacks input requirements, output details, and side effects. Enhanced version specifies what input is needed, what is returned, and importantly, what state changes occur (channel termination, status updates) for AI agent decision-making.

message: Operation 'status' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, missing_input_details, missing_output_details. Summary is too generic (single word). Description lacks clarity on required inputs (peer identifier format) and output details (what status information is included). Enhanced version specifies input requirements and provides concrete examples of returned data for better AI agent interpretability.

data.current_description: Retrieves the connection status for a specified peer.
data.summary_suggestion: Retrieve connection status for a peer
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves the current connection status for a specified peer. Requires the peer identifier as input. Returns detailed status information including connection state, last activity timestamp, and connection quality metrics.
data.reasoning: Summary is too generic (single word). Description lacks clarity on required inputs (peer identifier format) and output details (what status information is included). Enhanced version specifies input requirements and provides concrete examples of returned data for better AI agent interpretability.
